alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cowley and southeastern Sumner Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 819 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chilocco, or near Arkansas City, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Burden, Dexter, Geuda Springs, Cambridge, Winfield City Lake and Strother Field Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Kansas.
